author: Justin Harp
title: Batman v Superman: Is Jesse Eisenberg really playing Lex Luthor's… son?!? - Movies
text: Is Jesse Eisenberg's heavily-publicised appearance in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice really as DC Comics villain Lex Luthor's son?A new viral promotional campaign for Batman v Superman includes a freshly-opened Twitter account for Luthor, hinting at a new origin for the iconic villain. © Warner Bros. The Twitter account links to a fictitious Fortune magazine profile of LexCorp, which reveals Eisenberg's character as the son of Lex Luthor Sr.Fortune describes Lex as a "31-year-old wunderkind" hailed with pulling off the "superhuman feat" of modernising his father's company LexCorp."Dad named the company after himself ten years before I made my unexpected entrance into his life," the fictional article quotes Lex Jr as saying."But investors seemed to respond to the idea of an adoring father building a legacy for his precious son. He used that to his advantage. It was a good shtick and, whatever else he was, he was a good businessman."If that origin isn't curious enough, a tweet from the Lex Luthor Twitter account reads: "@FortuneMagazine Looking forward to reading about #LexCorp. Father would be proud.".@FortuneMagazine Looking forward to reading about #LexCorp. Father would be proud. http://t.co/esCqzVAaAz— Lex Luthor (@alexanderluthor) October 5, 2015In the pages of DC Comics and spinoff media like Smallville, Lex's father has traditionally been portrayed as a conniving businessman under various names including Lionel.Eisenberg previously explained that his version of Lex Luthor is far from a traditional comic book villain, saying: "It's a great character, there's an emotional core to the character. It's not this silly, villainous character. "This is a real depiction of a person who thinks these things. So the challenge is to make it seem real."Regardless of his origin, promotional material for the DC Comics series has tipped that Luthor plays a key role in the conflict between Batman and Superman.We'll know more about Lex's origins when Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice opens on March 25, 2016 in the US and the UK.Watch a trailer below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4351362182001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14351362182001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4351362182001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4351362182001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14351362182001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4351362182001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
